summary: LOW BEAM HEADLIGHTS DO NOT WORK. FOR SEVERAL MONTHS, I HAVE BEEN FORCED TO USE HIGH BEAMS WHEN DRIVING AT NIGHT. THE LACK OF LOW BEAM HEADLIGHTS IS EXTREMELY DANGEROUS TO ME, MY PASSENGERS AND OTHER DRIVERS. DEALERSHIP HAS NO ANSWERS AND AGREES THAT THIS DEFECT IS A MAJOR HAZARD. SERVICE ADVISOR AGREED THAT A RECALL SHOULD BE MADE TO REPAIR THE LOW BEAMS AND DOES NOT UNDERSTAND WHY A RECALL HAS NOT BEEN MADE.
